author: cnbc.com
title: Integra LifeSciences to Host First Quarter 2018 Earnings Results Conference Call on April 25, 2018
text:
PLAINSBORO, N.J., Integra LifeSciences Holdings Corporation (NASDAQ:IART), a leading global medical technology company, will release first quarter 2018 financial results on Wednesday, April 25, 2018, prior to market open. In conjunction with the earnings release, Integra will host a conference call at 8:30 a.m. ET.
Peter J. Arduini, president and chief executive officer, and Glenn Coleman, chief financial officer and corporate vice-president of International, will review first quarter 2018 results during the call.
The live call is accessible by dialing (323) 794-2093 and using the passcode 5958152. A simultaneous webcast of the call will be available via the Company’s website at www.integralife.com .
A webcast replay of the call can be accessed through the Investor Relations homepage of Integra's website at www.integralife.com . A replay of the call will be available through April 30, 2018 by dialing (719) 457-0820 and using the passcode 5958152.
About Integra LifeSciences
Integra LifeSciences is a global leader in regenerative technologies, neurosurgical and extremity orthopedic solutions dedicated to limiting uncertainty for clinicians, so they can focus on providing the best patient care. Integra offers a comprehensive portfolio of high quality, leadership brands that include AmnioExcel®, Bactiseal®, Cadence®, Certas™, Codman®, CUSA®, DuraGen®, DuraSeal®, ICP Express®, Integra®, MediHoney®, MicroFrance®, PriMatrix®, Salto Talaris®, SurgiMend®, TCC-EZ®, Titan™ and VersaTru™. For the latest news and information about Integra and its brands, please visit www.integralife.com .
